short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize art websites background for better shopping experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gallery wall chrome extension helps you visualize how art will look in your home when you shop online. Currently supporting desenio.com/.ca/.co.uk and .eu, you can customize the shopping online colour and layout to match your home. Customize background colours, number of columns, and add and customize frame thickness and colours.
